query:
query checkSavedListings($listingID: String, $previewHash: String, $require: String, $limit: Int, $campaignid: String, $storeid: String, $storeref: String, $countryid: Int, $languageid: Int, $env: String) {
  listings(listingID: $listingID, previewHash: $previewHash, require: $require, limit: $limit, campaignid: $campaignid, storeid: $storeid, storeref: $storeref, countryid: $countryid, languageid: $languageid, env: $env) {
    list {
      ...ListingBase
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}

fragment ListingBase on Listing {
  id
  imageURL(imageWidth: 325, previewHash: $previewHash, require: $require)
  originalDeal
  deal
  title
  finalPrice
  buyOnlineLinkURL
  saleStartDateString
  saleEndDateString
  postStartDateString
  postEndDateString
  previewPostStartDateString
  priceQualifier
  additionalDealInformation
  description
  productDescription
  customProductDescription
  finePrint
  onlineProductCode
  retailerProductCode
  languageID
  rating {
    id
    averageRating
    ratingRange
    reviewsURL
    totalReviews
    writeReviewURL
    __typename
  }
  store {
    id
    referenceNumber
    __typename
  }
  tags {
    id
    name
    __typename
  }
  departments {
    id
    name
    level
    __typename
  }
  napi
  __typename
}
